detail_desc: Short, pleated skirt in a textured weave with a concealed zip in one side and grosgrain trim at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Metal rings in various designs, one with an imitation-stone decoration.
Glasses with metal and plastic frames and clear lenses.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned cotton weave with buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Wide, covered elastication at the top and short raglan sleeves.

Tunic in an airy cotton weave with embroidery at the front. Small, pompom-trimmed stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front with narrow ties at the top and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips with a pompom trim and a lined, flared tier to the hem.
Non-wired, push-up biker body in jersey with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a deep round neckline, decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.

V-neck blouse in an airy weave made from a viscose blend with a unique nursing feature. Small stand-up collar and short sleeves with a decorative tab and button. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short woven shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits in the sides.
Wide, slightly boxy jumper in a soft knit with a shimmering metallic coating. Dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with cut-out sections on the shoulders and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and an open back with eyelets and decorative lacing. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and gently rounded hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Tunic in taffeta with a slight sheen made from recycled polyester. Gathers around the neckline and a V-shaped opening at the front. Wide, oversized balloon sleeves with wide cuffs. Box pleat at the front for added volume and a flare to the hem.
Knee-length jersey skirt with transparent tiers and a concealed zip at the side.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a hood, gathers at the shoulders and a double-layered front creating a draped effect.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
A-line dress in airy modal crêpe with frills around the neckline, cuffs and hem, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Unlined.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a wrapover front. Length approx. 34 cm, circumference approx. 55 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in patterned cotton jersey with gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted skirt in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist. Slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back. Flounce woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise around the neckline.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a lace yoke with frills and short cap sleeves.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a fully lined front and double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Light support.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Smartphone case in hard plastic with an adjustable fabric lanyard.
Short, one-shoulder, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a knot at the top of the shoulder strap. Lined.

Bandeau bra in sturdy microfibre with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under the clothes. Concealed, soft elastication at top and bottom edge. Mesh lining.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets with press-studs and a detachable belt at the waist. Lined.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, a foot strap and a narrow, elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and slim, covered heels.
Woven cotton blouse in a shorter style with a V-neck and concealed fastener at the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and wide, sewn-on ties at the waist.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck dress in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-style, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a regular, smocked waist and an extra flounced layer. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Hipster briefs in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with decorative pleats around the neckline and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Slip-on trainers with elastication and a decoration at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fitted outdoor shorts in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric with a zip fly, press-stud at the waist, and hook and loop safety fastener at the waistband. Zipped front pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a stretch panel at the crotch for optimum mobility and comfort.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Platform sandals with open toes, crossover foot straps and an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 10 cm.
Double-layered tube scarf in fine-knit wool with a small imitation leather appliqué at one edge.
Joggers in a soft, airy, fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a concealed button, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed style with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.

Multicoloured trainers in imitation leather with shimmering details. Padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Linings and insoles in mesh made from partly recycled polyester. Sturdy patterned rubber soles.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Wide, straight-style jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, low dropped shoulders, long, close-fitting sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a slit at the front.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and hard-worn details.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.

Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Microfibre leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.
Hoop earrings in textured metal.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Short, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels,buttons at the front and patch front pockets.
